dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
5 bar scales on map given in "Eastern miles", "Jewish stadia or furlongs", "Roman miles", "American miles", and "Miles".
Includes 2 indexes: Turkish provinces -- Refs. to Jerusalem.
Shows topography, drainage, national boundaries, territorial boundaries of the tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
"Tanner's universal atlas" -- at top. "67" -- top right corner.
